MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY1 postcode area of East Wemyss, affecting properties in William Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2.16pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected due to the complexity of repairs required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5.01pm on 19th February 2021.
